title: Ramadi's Fall To ISIS Revives Questions About U.S. Strategy
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to Ali Soufan, a former FBI agent and CEO of The Soufan Group, about how the U.S. should shape its strategy to stop the self-proclaimed Islamic State from taking Iraqi cities.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
